bot_response:
Ready for a digital adventure? Here's what I've got:

*Unleash your creativity! Ask me to 'Generate an image of (subject)' and watch your imagination come to life.

*I can provide insights and information about any image you share, with my image analysis feature - just say 'open image analyser/recogniser'. 

*I can search on Google - Say 'Search (query) on Google'.

*Need a mood lift? - Say 'Play (song name)' and let the music vibe begin.

*Feeling Bored? Let's watch some videos - Just Say 'Search (query) on YouTube'.

*Want to open an App effortlessly? - Just Say 'Open (app name)'.

*Memory slipping? Fear not! Command me to 'Remember (task)' and get your To-Do list by saying 'What do you remember?'.

*Game on! Say 'Play a game' and let the fun begin. I've got
	*Trivia
	*Stone, Paper, Scissors
	*Choose your own adventure game
	*Choose one option game

*Time for a digital nap! If I've been too chatty, simply say 'Time to sleep' and I'll power down until you're ready to wake me up again.

*You can directly ask me any question also!
